Skill.label: oos/frostbomb, replace frost bomb after a1
add Determination with aura cluster + mastery
----when using shield swap to these moveskills---
Orb of Storms early but drop when u need gemslots

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
wand craft = 1 magic wand/sceptre + 1 alteration + 1 sapphire(cold dmg to spells), ruby(fire dmg to spells) or topaz(lightning dmg to spells)(higher rarity = higher tier flat dmg but also level requirement) lvl 8 craft 1 magic wand/sceptre + 1 alt + 1 white resist ring lvl 14 craft 1 magic wand/sceptre + 1 alt + 1 magic resist ring lvl 20 craft 1 magic wand/sceptre + 1 alt + 1 rare resist ring
Prefer lightning craft forever
Early links: double BBG ------------------------- Spark - Pierce - added lightning at lvl 9 Frostbomb - Orb of Storms - Onslaught Frostblink - Arcane Surge Leap slam - Faster Attacks(act 2) Flame wall Holy Flame Totem
auras + changes in act 2 ------------------------------------- Spark - Pierce - Faster Casting(act 2) Orb of Storms - Onslaught - Added Lightning(act 1) Frostblink - Arcane Surge Leapslam - Faster Attacks(act 2) Herald of Thunder(act 2) - Herald of Ice(act 2) Flamewall
level 28 setup 4 links BBGR + BBGG ---------------------------------------- Spark - Pierce - Faster Casting(act 2) - Inspiration(library) Orb of Storms - Onslaught - Ice Bite(act 3) - Elemental Proliferation(act 1) Leap Slam - Faster Attacks(act 2) Flame wall Herald of Thunder(act 2) - Herald of Ice(act 2) Frostblink - Arcane Surge
Shield swap + determ links ----------------- Spark - Pierce - Faster Casting(act 2) - Inspiration(library) Orb of Storms - Onslaught - Ice Bite(act 3) - Elemental Proliferation(act 1) Shield charge(act 1) - Faster Attacks(act 2) Flame wall Determination(act 3/library) - Herald of Thunder(act 2) - Herald of Ice(act 2) Flame dash(act 1) - Arcane Surge Molten Shell
for a lategame ssfhc character, check out Goratha_Lostark on Goratha poe profile or just look through poe.ninja for spark inquis from 3.17 for some inspiration if you want a more SC or trade setup that does gigadmg with Nebulis/Aegis/CoTB
